QuestData.Title: The Baron's Demands
QuestData.Description: I'm bound fer that gallows fer sure, mate. That treasure's no good to me now...$B$BUnless I can use it ta buy me life. I'll make a deal with ye, $r. Smash these manacles and I'll tell ye where me treasure's buried.$B$BOh, me word is good, friend. I used ta be a real Baron, ye know.
QuestData.LogDescription: If you trust him, talk to Baron Longshore to free him from his manacles.
QuestData.CompletionText: Get on with it, mate. The guards may be back any moment. Ye know what ta do.
QuestData.RewardText: <The Baron rubs his sore wrists, his face widening into a malevolent grin.>$B$BOh I won't be runnin' off just yet. I'll free me mates and murder my way out of here at a time of me choosin'. As fer you - a deal's a deal. Let's talk about that treasure...
